```{r}
rm(list=ls())
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
library(dbplyr)
```
```{r}
us_census<-read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Sungileo/trainsets/main/drive-download-20230405T011215Z-001/US_census.csv")
#us_census %>% View()
```


```{r}
con <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), 
                      dbname = "testsqlite")
copy_to(dest = con, 
        df = us_census, 
        name = "us_census")

copy_to(dest = con,
        df = mtcars,
        name = "mtcars")


dbListTables(con)
```

```{sql, connection=con}
SELECT * FROM us_census
```

```{sql, connection = con}
select * from mtcars
```
